justification: Identifies B as QB-rich and seeking floor/depth, but misreads B’s strict preference for workhorse RBs and possession WRs; the offered pieces are volatile committees and a boom/bust WR. Separates A’s playoff/injury-buy logic from B’s needs, but shallowly. Trade is feasible and A’s interest in an injured dual-threat with good playoff slate is coherent, yet A overpays and still lacks a current starting QB. Rationale is terse and omits key context (B’s consensus-driven mindset, Lucas Carter’s uncertainty, A’s QB void).
